This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS If the control is not descendant of canvas, event should not be fired. 
PASS The event object should not be changed even if mutate the DOM. 
PASS Rerouting mouse/touch event test 
PASS Rerouting mouse/touch event test but the id of hit region is unset. 
PASS Touch events are defined to have "implicit capture". 
PASS MouseEventInit. 
PASS TouchEventInit. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
